quiz.py.keyStrokeInfo:
def bestQuiz(l):
    # Your  code goes here...
      res = []
      for i in range(len(l[0])):
            average = 0
            count = 0
            for j in range(len(l)):
                  if l[j][i]!= -1:
                        average += l[j][i]
                        count+=1
            # print(average/2)
            if count!= 0:
                  res.append(average/count)
      
      # print(res.index(max(res)))
      if len(res) < 1:
            return None
      
      return res.index(max(res))

print(bestQuiz( [[ 88,  80, 91 ],
          [ 68, 100, -1 ]]))
   
def testBestQuiz():
    print('Testing bestQuiz()...', end='')
    a = [ [ 88,  80, 91 ],
          [ 68, 100, -1 ]]
    assert(bestQuiz(a) == 2)
    a = [ [ 88,  80, 80 ],
          [ 68, 100, 100 ]]
    assert(bestQuiz(a) == 1)
    a = [ [88, -1, -1 ],
          [68, -1, -1 ]]
    assert(bestQuiz(a) == 0)
    a = [ [-1, -1, -1 ],
          [-1, -1, -1 ]]
    assert(bestQuiz(a) == None)
    print('All test cases passed...!')
